name: Chicken Rice
preparations: 1. Lightly salt 200ml water, bring to a boil
2. Slice up 30g of Ginger, chop up 30g of scallion together with roots into 3 parts, peel half of a garlic with skin on
3. Dump into boiling water
4. 5 minutes later, dump in chicken thigh to boil for 15 minutes
5. Minced 3/4 of a garlic, slice up 37.5g of ginger, stir fry until golden
6. Add in 100ml of washed rice into the same pan and lightly stir fry in medium heat for a minute
7. Transfer white rice into a rice cooker, and add in 100ml of broth from the chicken, start rice cooker
8. Minced the remaining garlic, ginger, chop up scallion into tiny bits, add in a pinch of salt and a splash of soy sauce and mix together
9. On a pan, heat up oil till smoking, and drizzle oil over the mixture of ginger, garlic scallion
10. Serve chicken, rice and broth

name: Steak and Mash
preparations: 1. Deskin potatoes and boil in high heat.
2. Season steak in coarse salt and pepper for 20 minutes at room temperature.
3. 20 minutes later, pour in all the rapeseed oil into a pan and heat it until smoking.
4. Slowly place steak into hot pan, searing each side for a minute and 20 seconds
In the last 30 seconds, add in 10g butter and thyme and baste steak
5. Let steak cool on a cooling rack, heat off, leaving the oil in pan
6. Mash potatoes, adding in milk, salt and pepper from time to time, as well as 3/4 of the steak oil
7. Slice steak when cooled, drizzling some oil on top
8. Serve

name: Salmon bowl
preparations: 1. Salt salmon skin, let it rest for 10 minutes.
2. Cook rice in a rice cooker
3. Wipe water and salt off the surface of salmon skin.
4. Heat up oil in pan until smoking, put in salmon skin down
5. Flip salmon once skin crisps, and fry for another minute
6. Salmon off pan, serve with rice
